channel.title: Henno AI Blog
channel.description: AI automation insights and guides for small businesses. Learn how to save time, cut costs, and grow with practical automation strategies.

item.title: AI automation for real estate agencies: a practical guide to getting started
item.description: A practical guide to AI automation for real estate agencies. Which 5 workflows to automate first, what a connected AI stack costs in Rands, and how to go from zero to running in 4 weeks.
